event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Program Counter
event.name: SW change
event.description: Software change of PC, except by an exception, architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Procedure Return
event.description: Procedure return architecturally executed (not by exceptions)

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: EXPL_ICIALLU
event.description: I-cache and BTAC Invalidates Explicit ICIALLU

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: IMPL_ICIALLU
event.description: I-cache and BTAC Invalidates Implicit ICIALLU

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: NONICIALLU_BTAC_INV
event.description: I-cache and BTAC Invalidates Non-ICIALLU BTAC Invalidate

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: ICIMVAU_IMPL_ICIALLU
event.description: I-cache and BTAC Invalidates ICIMVAU-implied ICIALLU

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: FIFO_FULLBLK_CMT
event.description: Commits Trace FIFO full Blk CMT

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: FAIL_COND_INST
event.description: Conditional instructions failing conditional instrs (excluding branches)

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: PASS_COND_INST
event.description: Conditional instructions passing conditional instrs (excluding branches)

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: ALLOW_VU_CLK
event.description: Unit Clock Gating Allow VU Clks

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: ALLOW_L2_CLK
event.description: Unit Clock Gating Allow L2 Clks

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: DTLB_IMPL_INV_SCTLR_DACR
event.description: DTLB implicit invalidates writes to SCTLR and DACR

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: VX_PIPE_LOAD_USE_STALL
event.description: Scorpion VX pipe load use stall

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: VS_PIPE_WAR_STALL_CYCLES
event.description: Scorpion VS pipe WAR stall cycles

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: VS_PIPE_WAW_STALL_CYCLES
event.description: Scorpion VS pipe WAW stall cycles

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: VS_PIPE_RAW_STALL_CYCLES
event.description: Scorpion VS pipe RAW stall cycles

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: COND_INST_FAIL_VX_PIPE
event.description: Scorpion conditional instruction fail VX pipe

event.title: Scorpion
event.name: COND_INST_FAIL_VS_PIPE
event.description: Scorpion conditional instruction fail VS pipe
